name: Merge Cats - Get Crypto Tokens
description:
Merge Cats is a crypto game with the ability to earn and withdraw cryptocurrency

  • Open boxes with cats, buy cats, run them on the flight strip so that they earn coins;
  • Performing daily quest quests - get SOULS, tokens that can be withdrawn to a crypto wallet;
  • Explore new locations;
  • Participate and win tokens reward tournaments.

Over 67,000 token withdrawal transactions completed
